summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 19, University Park Addition, from East 45th Street to East 47th Street to East 47th Street; between 18th Avenue Northeast and 19th Avenue Northeast; by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 92833, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
